original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business requirements and technical implementation, responsible for ensuring our systems accurately reflect and support complex business processes. As a key member of the team, you will leverage your exceptional analytical skills, technical proficiency, and business acumen to drive the development and optimization of our vehicle configuration systems. By collaborating closely with stakeholders, translating their needs into effective technical solutions, and continuously improving system efficiency, you will play a pivotal role in enhancing the overall performance and capabilities of our organization.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques, and ensure they are clearly understood
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting/resolving configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, utilizing querying, reporting, and data visualization tools as needed
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and participate in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps
- Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify and address complex issues
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to effectively translate technical information for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in understanding and documenting business requirements using techniques such as user stories, use cases, and process flows
- Solid technical skills in areas like data mapping, integration, and system configuration, with the ability to implement and test changes

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with Java and SQL, which are critical for working with our [mention specific system] backend
- Familiarity with machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) principles and their application in system optimization

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a role that blends business analysis, system configuration, and process improvement
- Demonstrated track record of successfully translating business requirements into technical solutions and optimizing system performance

Preferred Experience:
- Experience with Agile methodologies, which are integral to our development and delivery processes
- Prior exposure to vehicle configuration systems and processes, providing a valuable understanding of the domain

Tools & Technologies:
- [mention specific system] platform
- SQL and data analysis tools
- Requirement gathering and documentation tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence)
- Collaboration and communication tools (e.g., Microsoft Office, Slack)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with regular stakeholder engagement
- Ability to work in an Agile/iterative development model, with a focus on continuous improvement
- Willingness to participate in user acceptance testing and provide ongoing support for system configurations

Role Overview:
This role is a critical link between business strategy and technical execution, responsible for ensuring our vehicle configuration systems seamlessly support and enhance our organization's operational capabilities. As a highly analytical and technically proficient individual, you will be a key player in translating complex business requirements into effective system configurations, optimizing processes, and driving continuous improvement. By collaborating closely with stakeholders, leveraging data-driven insights, and implementing innovative solutions, you will play a pivotal role in shaping the future of our vehicle configuration systems and contributing to the overall success of the organization.

Key Responsibilities:
- Engage with stakeholders across various departments to deeply understand their business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them using industry-standard techniques
- Develop and maintain comprehensive configuration specifications for our [mention specific system] backend, ensuring they accurately reflect the business requirements
- Create and modify data mappings and integrations to support the efficient flow of information between our systems
- Implement and thoroughly test new configurations, ensuring they meet the specified requirements and function as expected
- Proactively identify and troubleshoot configuration-related issues, working closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to resolve them
- Analyze existing data to uncover trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, utilizing querying, reporting, and data visualization tools
- Recommend and implement configuration changes and best practices to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency
- Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the effectiveness of system configurations
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing maintenance and enhancements
- Foster a collaborative environment, working closely with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex issues and devise effective solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to liaise effectively with technical and non-technical stakeholders
- Proficiency in translating business requirements into technical configurations, using techniques such as user stories, use cases, and process flows
- Strong technical skills in areas like data mapping, integration, and system configuration, with the ability to implement, test, and optimize changes

Preferred Skills:
- Familiarity with Java and SQL, which are crucial for working with our [mention specific system] backend
- Understanding of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) principles, and their potential application in optimizing system performance

Required Experience:
- Minimum 5 years of experience in a role that combines business analysis, system configuration, and process improvement
- Demonstrated track record of successfully delivering technical solutions that address complex business needs and drive operational efficiency

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience with Agile methodologies, which are integral to our development and delivery processes
- Exposure to vehicle configuration systems and processes, providing valuable domain-specific knowledge

Tools & Technologies:
- [mention specific system] platform
- SQL and data analysis tools
- Requirement gathering and documentation tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence)
- Collaboration and communication tools (e.g., Microsoft Office, Slack)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with frequent stakeholder engagement
- Ability to work in an Agile/iterative development model, with a focus on continuous improvement and innovation
- Willingness to participate in user acceptance testing and provide ongoing support for system configurations, ensuring the seamless operation of our vehicle configuration systems

Role Overview:
This is a strategic role that combines business acumen, technical expertise, and a passion for process optimization. As a key member of our team, you will be responsible for ensuring our vehicle configuration systems accurately reflect and support the evolving needs of our organization. By deeply understanding business requirements, translating them into effective technical solutions, and continuously driving system improvements, you will play a pivotal role in enhancing the overall performance and capabilities of our vehicle configuration processes. Your ability to bridge the gap between business and technology, leverage data-driven insights, and implement innovative configurations will be critical to the success of this role and the organization as a whole.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to gather comprehensive business requirements, utilizing techniques such as user stories, use cases, and process flows to document them clearly and concisely
- Translate the gathered business requirements into robust technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, and implementing and testing new configurations
- Proactively identify and troubleshoot configuration-related issues, working cross-functionally with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to resolve them in a timely manner
- Analyze existing data to uncover trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, leveraging querying, reporting, and data visualization tools to generate actionable insights
- Recommend and implement configuration changes and best practices to streamline business processes, enhance system efficiency, and drive continuous improvement
- Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the effectiveness of system configurations and ensure they meet the specified requirements
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing maintenance and future enhancements
- Foster a collaborative environment, working closely with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations
- Leverage your understanding of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) principles to explore innovative ways of optimizing system performance and automating repetitive tasks

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex issues, identify root causes, and devise effective solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to translate technical information for non-technical audiences and build strong working relationships with stakeholders
- Proficiency in understanding and documenting business requirements using industry-standard techniques, such as user stories, use cases, and process flows
- Robust technical skills in areas like data mapping, integration, and system configuration, with the ability to implement, test, and optimize changes

Preferred Skills:
- Proven experience with Java and SQL, which are critical for working with our [mention specific system] backend
- Strong working knowledge of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) principles, and their practical application in optimizing system performance and automating processes

Required Experience:
- Minimum 7-10 years of experience in a role that combines business analysis, system configuration, and process improvement, with a proven track record of delivering successful technical solutions
- Demonstrated ability to effectively translate complex business requirements into effective technical configurations and drive continuous system optimization

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience working in an Agile/iterative development environment, with a focus on continuous improvement and innovation
- Exposure to vehicle configuration systems and processes, providing valuable domain-specific knowledge and context

Tools & Technologies:
- [mention specific system] platform
- SQL and data analysis tools
- Requirement gathering and documentation tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence)
- Collaboration and communication tools (e.g., Microsoft Office, Slack)
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence platforms (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Highly collaborative, cross-functional team environment with frequent stakeholder engagement
- Ability to work in an Agile/iterative development model, with a strong emphasis on continuous improvement and innovation
- Willingness to participate in user acceptance testing and provide ongoing support for system configurations, ensuring the seamless operation and optimization of our vehicle configuration systems
- Proactive approach to identifying opportunities for process enhancements and leveraging emerging technologies to drive efficiency and automation
